column4: hey guys, i'm trying to access a site in Firefox, and it's not loading. It's only this particular site that's not working, and it works fine in Internet Explorer on Windows. It's https://gandalf.registrar.ualberta.ca/Admission/Application Is there any way to get this site to work? I've already tried User Agent Switcher...
maybe an extension is messing with the site?
that might make sense. is there a quick way to disable extensions?
